name: Ipso Ventures
overview:
Once IPSO has identified the demand for a new technology we work with our research partners to source IP that has the potential to be developed into a valuable commercial opportunity.

Whether the appropriate commercialisation route is licencing or creating a spin out company much of our early development process is the same. Indeed licencing and spin out creation are two ends of the commercialisation continuum and the appropriate route for a particular piece of technology may involve a blend of both.

We transform these technologies into commercial opportunities by providing capital, management expertise, business development support and corporate finance advice depending on the route chosen.

funding_round.source_description: Ipso Ventures PLC Investment in Axilica
